file.name: account.openapi.yaml
file.content:
info:
    title: Maganets Account API
    description: |
        Cadastro genérico de usuários, organizações tenants e permissões
    contact:
        name: Magalu
        url: github.com/luizalabs
        email: suporte@dev.magalu.com
    version: 0.0.1
servers:
    - url: https://alpha.api.magalu.com/account
      description: Descrição do server
components:
    schemas:
        WhoAmIResponseDto:
            properties:
                active_tenant:
                    properties:
                        id:
                            maxLength: 255
                            minLength: 1
                            type: string
                        type:
                            maxLength: 255
                            minLength: 1
                            type: string
                    type: object
                created_at:
                    description: We expect date in ISO 8601 format of YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss.SSSZ in UTC
                    format: date-time
                    type: string
                first_name:
                    maxLength: 255
                    minLength: 1
                    type: string
                last_accessed_at:
                    description: We expect date in ISO 8601 format of YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss.SSSZ in UTC
                    format: date-time
                    type: string
                last_name:
                    maxLength: 255
                    minLength: 1
                    type: string
                preferred_email:
                    maxLength: 64
                    minLength: 1
                    type: string
                updated_at:
                    description: We expect date in ISO 8601 format of YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss.SSSZ in UTC
                    format: date-time
                    type: string
                uuid:
                    format: uuid
                    type: string
            required:
                - uuid
                - preferred_email
                - first_name
                - last_name
                - active_tenant.id
                - active_tenant.type
                - created_at
                - updated_at
                - last_accessed_at
            type: object
        AccountResponseDto:
            properties:
                created_at:
                    description: We expect date in ISO 8601 format of YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss.SSSZ in UTC
                    format: date-time
                    type: string
                first_name:
                    maxLength: 255
                    minLength: 1
                    type: string
                last_accessed_at:
                    description: We expect date in ISO 8601 format of YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss.SSSZ in UTC
                    format: date-time
                    type: string
                last_name:
                    maxLength: 255
                    minLength: 1
                    type: string
                preferred_email:
                    maxLength: 64
                    minLength: 1
                    type: string
                updated_at:
                    description: We expect date in ISO 8601 format of YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss.SSSZ in UTC
                    format: date-time
                    type: string
                uuid:
                    format: uuid
                    type: string
            required:
                - uuid
                - preferred_email
                - first_name
                - last_name
                - created_at
                - updated_at
                - last_accessed_at
            type: object
        OrganizationResponseDto:
            properties:
                created_at:
                    description: We expect date in ISO 8601 format of YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss.SSSZ in UTC
                    format: date-time
                    type: string
                updated_at:
                    description: We expect date in ISO 8601 format of YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss.SSSZ in UTC
                    format: date-time
                    type: string
                uuid:
                    format: uuid
                    type: string
                name:
                    maxLength: 255
                    minLength: 1
                    type: string
                tenants:
                    items:
                        $ref: '#/components/schemas/OrganizationTenantResponseDto'
                    type: array
            required:
                - uuid
                - name
                - created_at
                - updated_at
                - tenants
            type: object
        AccountTenantsResponseDto:
            properties:
                tenants:
                    $ref: '#/components/schemas/TenantsResponseDto'
            required:
                - tenants
            type: object
        TenantResponseDto:
            properties:
                created_at:
                    description: We expect date in ISO 8601 format of YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss.SSSZ in UTC
                    format: date-time
                    type: string
                type:
                    maxLength: 255
                    minLength: 1
                    type: string
                updated_at:
                    description: We expect date in ISO 8601 format of YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss.SSSZ in UTC
                    format: date-time
                    type: string
                uuid:
                    maxLength: 255
                    minLength: 1
                    type: string
            required:
                - uuid
                - type
                - created_at
                - updated_at
            type: object
        OrganizationTenantResponseDto:
            properties:
                created_at:
                    description: We expect date in ISO 8601 format of YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss.SSSZ in UTC
                    format: date-time
                    type: string
                type:
                    maxLength: 255
                    minLength: 1
                    type: string
                updated_at:
                    description: We expect date in ISO 8601 format of YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss.SSSZ in UTC
                    format: date-time
                    type: string
                uuid:
                    maxLength: 255
                    minLength: 1
                    type: string
                active:
                    description: Tenant status
                    type: boolean
            required:
                - uuid
                - type
                - created_at
                - updated_at
            type: object
        TenantsResponseDto:
            items:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/TenantResponseDto'
            type: array
paths:
    /v1/whoami:
        get:
            operationId: getWhoAmI
            responses:
                "401":
                    description: Forbidden
                "403":
                    description: Unauthorized
                "404":
                    description: Account not found
                default:
                    content:
                        application/json:
                            schema:
                                $ref: '#/components/schemas/WhoAmIResponseDto'
                    description: The account data
            summary: Get account
    /v1/whoami/tenants:
        get:
            operationId: getAccountTenants
            responses:
                "401":
                    description: Forbidden
                "403":
                    description: Unauthorized
                "404":
                    description: Account tenants not found
                default:
                    content:
                        application/json:
                            schema:
                                $ref: '#/components/schemas/AccountTenantsResponseDto'
                    description: The account tenants data
            summary: Get account tenants
    /v1/accounts/{uuid}:
        get:
            parameters:
                - in: path
                  name: uuid
                  schema:
                      type: string
                      format: uuid
                  required: true
                  description: UUID of the account to get
            operationId: getAccount
            responses:
                "401":
                    description: Forbidden
                "403":
                    description: Unauthorized
                "404":
                    description: Account not found
                default:
                    content:
                        application/json:
                            schema:
                                $ref: '#/components/schemas/AccountResponseDto'
                    description: The account data
            summary: Get account
    /v1/organizations/{uuid}:
        get:
            parameters:
                - in: path
                  name: uuid
                  schema:
                      type: string
                      format: uuid
                  required: true
                  description: UUID of the account to get
            operationId: getOrganization
            responses:
                "401":
                    description: Forbidden
                "403":
                    description: Unauthorized
                "404":
                    description: Organization not found
                default:
                    content:
                        application/json:
                            schema:
                                $ref: '#/components/schemas/OrganizationResponseDto'
                    description: The organization data
            summary: Get organization
openapi: 3.0.2
